text: Tugi di madagoaa deelaa gaa hana gi muli, Gideon la gu haga ingoo bolo “Jerub Baal”6.32 Jerub Baal: di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Dugua anga gi Baal gii bida abaabalia ia” , idimaa Joash gu helekai boloo, “Dugua anga gi Baal gii bida abaabalia ia. Ma di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha ni mee dela ne oho.”
